marklogic.body:
It's even moreso in this post-Cold War and soon-to-be post-Arab oil Era of the Arab Spring. The long-persecuted Arab state residents have finally realized that Israel was the scapegoat and red herring distraction that ruling despots used to hold power.
Israel's own ruling ultra-orthodox faction got really scared at the sudden lack of attention on the world and regional stage. Just like Iran, they hold power by feeding paranoia. Desperately they had to scream, "Hey, remember us!" to no avail. So they upped the ante by sabre rattling a la Libya and North Korea. A one trick pony. We can only hope Israelis will finally rise up and overthrown their own Ayatollahs and return power to the secular supermajority of Jews.
